titleStmt.title: The actes of Christe and of Antichriste concernyng bothe their life and doctrine: diligently gathered and now taken out of his workes, by Thomas Becon.
titleStmt.author: Becon, Thomas, 1512-1567.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Ihon Daie. Cum gratia & priuilegio Regiæ Magistatis per decennium,
